name: Pirate Bay (SweetAppleGames)
description:
WASD -> sail your ship

Left Click -> port-side canons (ship's left)

Right Click -> starboard-side canons (ship's right)

______________________________________________________

Collect as many treasure chest's as you can while battling other sailor's in this realtime physics based world.

Every roll of the dice adds a new element to the bay.

If you like this game and are interested in the future full release,  feel free to follow along.

The music is by two of my good friends.
